title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 05, 2016  Picnic in the Park Talent Show and More  We're getting ready for the Park Service's 100 year birthday!  Join us for concerts from the Post Band, a talent show, living history and much more!   July 18, 2016  Fort Larned Hosting Duct Tape Art Exhibit  Artist Chad Farnes has created art pieces featuring landscapes for the exhibit “A Tribute to our National Parks” using the 59 National Parks as inspiration to create his duct tape masterpieces.   July 13, 2016  Get Ready to Picnic in the Park  We're getting ready for a big birthday bash!   June 28, 2016  Celebrate American History at Fort Larned this Fourth of July  Fort Larned is the perfect place to celebrate our nation's birthday this Fourth of July weekend.   June 13, 2016  Fort Larned Welcomes New Citizens on June 24th  Fort Larned host new citizens as they take their oath of citizenship.   June 08, 2016  Two Centennial Saturday Programs for Kids  June is kids month at Fort Larned.  Every Saturday this month you'll have the opportunity to attend a kid-friendly special program.   May 25, 2016  Junior Ranger Archeology Program  Learn how to uncover the past through archeology!   May 11, 2016  Memorial Day Weekend Events  Make this Memorial Day Weekend memorable at Fort Larned.   April 22, 2016  National Park Week at Fort Larned  Larned High School students baked bread and hardtack at Fort Larned for National Park Week.          Check out the archive for past press releases.
